author: Juan Trejo
comment: The watchfaces are beautiful and realistic in high resolution smartwatches. I paid in hopes full ambient mode was a paid app option but at least on LG Watch Urbane it is not available. The upset is that because it is an in-app purchase, I can't get a refund. See I use all my watchfaces in full ambient otherwise it beats the purpose for me. I recommend Weareal watchface as a great alternative for that.
title: No Full Ambient

author: Alex Sandilands
comment: Just like you can see in the pictures, it is very nice, and well worth the praise it is getting from pretty much everyone.  I love skeleton watches and have been on the lookout for a watch face that has skeleton features, and actually looks good. This is the first! The option to remove the tourbillon is nice as well (not that I ever would!)  One thing I would like added if possible is a setting which allows adjustment of the outside golden rim. On the Moto360 it kind of looks like there are two rims with this watch face, so a setting which could make it smaller, or even remove it entirely would be an awesome addition.
title: Nearly perfect.

author: Jeff Hintze
comment: It says it's for the moto 360 and other watches. I have the LG G watch R and after 24 hours the watch face still never showed up for me. I rebooted both devices but still no luck
title: Wouldn't show up

author: Paul Hansen
comment: For those having issues getting it to show, it didn't populate on my list for almost 10 min after install. Not sure why. Changed my rating to reflect this. Don't uninstall and reinstall. Just give it some time.
title: Finally shows up

author: Randy Law
comment: Shuts off after 10 seconds and defaults to a ho, hum dull-white something. Come on, charge me 2 bucks and let me choose the timeout settings.
title: Beautiful face gone in a blink of an eye

author: Past Done
comment: It's unfortunate that this watchface doesn't work on my LG g watch r. It's the only watchface from my library of watchfaces that crashes and doesn't work. I'm Hoping you guys make it g watch compatible.
title: Doesn't support LG G Watch R

author: Bob Miner
comment: Works fine on square zenwatch. But for  us square zenwatch users, perhaps add a  blackened border? Or remove the border & run the color to the edge?  Add that into the upgrade and u get ur last star to make 5 ;)
title: If only.....

author: John Egan
comment: Installed, looked great, then just disappeared from my G-Watch and my and my LG-G3... NOT EVEN AFTER UNINSTALLING AND REINSTALLING.... JUST A GREAT BIG HEAP OF STEAMING GOLDEN POOP! I might have to eat that if the upgrade to my watch to Android 5.0 works though.... Still questionable development to not be backwards compatible with so many Android Wear watches in the world?!
title: Golden POOP!

author: Michael McDaniel
comment: The face is not very good looking on the actual watch. It looks much better in the picture here. And all the other faces that look really nice, cost extra and probably don't look any better upon closer inspection
title: Pretty low quality

author: Don Joslyn
comment: The pictures on Google Play look much better than the actual watch face, at least on my LG G Watch R. The pictures show much more detail than you will actually get.
title: Very disappointed

author: Corporal Lozano
comment: I love it, it's a compliment piece. I'm having troubles getting into the settings to try another face color but other than that you can't go wrong with choosing this face. The seconds glide, an added bonus.

author: Monster Workbench
comment: Only getting 4 stars because the away screen looks terrible. Had to set the watch to go black
title: Looks nice

author: T. Masinter
comment: I finally received the 5.0 update and can use this beautiful watch face! I'm so excited to find that the gears actually move. I purchased the additional colors and they're wonderful. I do wish there was a purple. My only difficulty is that I'm so mesmerized by this gorgeous watch face that I forget to check the time. :-D
title: Very Beautiful!

author: bob n fishy
comment: Only issue is that I can't always change the color because of a billing error. I paid for the app, but it doesn't always recognize that. May just be my phone, though.
title: Looks nice

author: Prof.Osama Shaeer
comment: This watch face was elegant in both the regular aand dimmerd modes, and I was able to change its colour from the phone. After updating to wear v.5, I am unable to find the phone app despite uninstalling and reinstalling.   Update:  I accessed settings. However, the dimmed mode is the black and white mode like other watch faces,not the elegant dim gold background that was there before the update. Please revert.. Update 2 I'll have to take it down from 5 Stars to 1 until it reverts to the previous dimmed mode

reply.author: Zuhanden
reply.content: Hi Osama, please access the setting of the watch face from Android Wear comapnion app. Select watch face. Then tap on setting icon on the watch picker. Hope this helps. Hans

title: Excellent, but:

author: Jean-Daniel Valery
comment: Watch face is very attractive but once selected, it is not the first face that shows up when you wake the watch up. Another face shows up first and then it switches to the one from the app.
title: Pretty but....

author: Noel Bergman
comment: This is a stunningly gorgeous watch face on my ZenWatch.  Right up there with the beautiful Rebecca Minkoff watch face.  The (now fixed) dimmed mode could do with a bit more visual appeal, but given the constraints of not wanting to wear out the battery, nicely done so far.
title: Looks great!

author: Alejandro Molino
comment: I own a black moto360 upgraded to lollipop and i have been thinking for a while if I should buy it or not,  but its worth it,  your watch completely change,  it looks gorgeous, more expensive and depending on the background it could be prestigious for male ,  delicately for female  or unisexually appealing for both audience. I recommend to add a silver hoop to expand even more the gallery for those who already buy the bundle.   Great job!  Q.  What about golden times instead of beauty?  Would be + appealing
title: Prestigious,  delicate and unisexual

author: Nick Kul
comment: Looks very good On huawei watch. The only issue, looks not that realist (as real watch) comparing with faces provided by huawei. But,  again  looks good!
title: Huawei watch

author: Shawn Altorio
comment: I love the look of this watch face on my moto 360.  One issue however, is that whenever my watch screen turns on, there is a moment where the default watch face is visible before Golden Beauty loads. I've seen this on some other watch faces (especially those by the same developer), and aren't sure what the issue is, but would appreciate if it were fixed. - Additionally, I'd love for options for:   1). discreet second ticks (rather than smooth movement)   2). display of the numerical day of the month
title: Elegant... and almost perfect

author: Lemuel Rodrigues
comment: Good design, lacking the date section. If you could develop diamonds around would make this watch face the best for a very long time. Kudos for now.
title: Good design, lacking the date section.

author: JM Ayala
comment: A nicely designed watch face. Especially like the turning cogs and ambient screen. Could use some more options to boost it to a five-star rating.
title: Great Design

author: Dan Levy
comment: Battery died within hours on my watch and it usually lasts more than a day. As soon as I switched faces my watch was back to normal. Using Samsung Galaxy Note 4
title: Killed my watch battery. Samsung Note 4

author: Eddie Albert
comment: I like the look of the watch faces and gives it a great look.  Only wish it could have chrome silver bezels instead of copper / gold.
title: Nice face.....s....

author: Juan du Toit
comment: Would be awesome with a longer display option and a full ambient mode, a few developers are doing this  and gives the user a choice to show off a bit 😉 5 star rating will apply then 👌
title: Awesome design but..

author: Randy Simon
comment: I purchased this face and it worked briefly but stopped. It doesn't  appear on either my phone or my watch. I emailed the developer, but received no response. Very disappointed.
title: Doesn't work. No response from developer.

author: Jody Hertel
comment: Got this, then disappeared from my phone. Shows up in the app manager but cannot open it nor does it show up in my apps.
title: Waste for time!!

author: Sean Young
comment: I downloaded and paid on Saturday its now Monday and its still not there...im not happy. I mean its only a buck but still...Now with an edit its one month later and it still won't sync or populate on my list. Help or please refund!

author: Bryce Wilson
comment: As with all your faces, you do not give the user control of how long it is in bright mode. Five seconds is way too short. Let the user decide how long they want the screen to be bright.
title: Looks great, but...

author: Adrian McKee
comment: Paid for it originally now it wants me to pay for some options. What a rip. Doesn't even work anymore.
title: Greatly disapointed

author: Bryan Riddick
comment: This is a truly beautiful watch face and I love showing it off, however, I do wish it has some sort of date indicator. I check the date frequently and it's the primary reason I don't wear this face more often.
title: Beautiful

author: Tom Hartung
comment: Beautiful watch faces but it drains the battery. When checking on the mobile the battery stats it showed 10% right after "watch idle". Switch back to the minimal design until it's fixed
title: Drains battery from moto 360

author: Krishna S
comment: Totally in love with this one. It resembles my real automatic watch..I've got half a dozen compliments already within a day, so good job developer..
title: Pure Elegance

author: Muhammad Ali Alidina
comment: Beautiful watch face, but given that you have to buy other colours, there should be a few further options like adding the date at the very least.
title: No date or battery options let it down

author: Noel Anderson
comment: Doesn't work on my LG g watch r.     Was working previously - before I purchased full version!!!!.

reply.author: Zuhanden
reply.content: Hi Noel, this release is exclusively for Android Wear 5.0. Please wait until your smartwatch updates to the new Android Wear 5.0. Then it should work again. Unfortunately there was no other way to do this. Thx for your patience. Hans

author: Newton Ranju
comment: I hate that it doesn't show on my tecno h5 android
title: Not showing

author: Model Z
comment: Wonderful watchface. Love the tourbillon, which is the reason I downloaded it in the first place. Wish you could change the border color. Please add this feature in an update, then you get 5 stars.

author: Jammy Anmol
comment: Watch faces which are actually worth putting are not free.. I understand that is the only way for app makers to earn money.. But doesn't help me either..doez it?
title: Not actually free

author: Jared Rich
comment: There's no way to change the screen timeout time or what it looks like in ambient mode. This is the first watch face that I've bought that doesn't have those options.  :-(
title: Needs more options in the settings

author: Tee Jackson
comment: I have no clue how to activate this on my watch!
title: No clue
